com.eteks.sweethome3d.model

Class Polyline

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eteks.sweethome3d.model.HomeObject
      • com.eteks.sweethome3d.model.Polyline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Elevatable, Selectable, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class Polyline
extends HomeObject
implements Selectable, Elevatable
    A polyline or a polygon in a home plan.
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
